newsitem.title: UK: Manchester United names Gill finance head.
newsitem.headline: Manchester United names Gill finance head.

text.p: English soccer club Manchester United Plc said on Monday it has named David Gill as its group finance director.
Gill, former finance director of First Choice Holidays Plc, will start at Manchester in February.
The company also said it promoted David Beswitherick to company secretary from group financial controller.
